scripts.work: ./prepare-book.sh cn && ./prepare-book.sh tw && ./prepare-book.sh cn -nc && ./prepare-book.sh tw -nc && ./prepare-style.sh && ./prepare-font.sh cn && ./prepare-font.sh tw
